description: Try our easy to follow Greek Lemony Lamb Pitas with Sweet Potato Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Greek Lemony Lamb Pitas with Sweet Potato Chips
name: Greek Lemony Lamb Pitas with Sweet Potato Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, warm pita breads in the oven while chips are cooking. Split pita in half and fill with lettuce, tomato, lamb and chips. Dollop with tzatziki and crumble over feta to serve.
